summary: Frontend testing completed for Vite host blocking fix. All 4 requested features verified working: Landing page loads correctly, Login flow with test@jarlpm.com/Test123! redirects to /dashboard, Logout flow redirects to landing page, Signup page loads with form validation.

frontend: Landing page loads at / with JarlPM branding
Landing page shows 'Ship like you have a Senior PM' hero text
Landing page has Sign in and Get Started buttons in nav
Landing page has Generate an Initiative CTA button
Login page loads at /login with email and password inputs
Login redirects to /dashboard after successful authentication
Dashboard shows user menu with 'TU Test User' in top right
User menu dropdown shows Settings and Log out options
Signup page loads at /signup with form fields
Signup form has Full Name, Email, Password, Confirm Password fields
Signup form has Create account button
Signup form has Sign in link for existing users
Signup form validation works - HTML5 required field validation
Signup form validation works - Email format validation
Signup form shows password requirements (8+ chars, number, uppercase, lowercase)

critical_code_review_comments: vite.config.js allowedHosts correctly set to ['.preview.emergentagent.com'] wildcard - fix verified working
Login.jsx has proper data-testid attributes for testing (login-email-input, login-password-input, login-submit-btn)
Landing.jsx has proper data-testid attributes (nav-signin-btn, nav-get-started-btn, hero-generate-initiative-btn)
API base URL correctly configured via VITE_BACKEND_URL environment variable
Session management working correctly - cookies persist across navigation

success_rate.backend: N/A - backend testing skipped per request

context_for_next_testing_agent: Vite host blocking fix verified working. Frontend loads correctly at https://aipm-platform-1.preview.emergentagent.com. Login/logout flows working. Test user (test@jarlpm.com / Test123!) has active subscription and existing data (Pharmacy Text Connect initiative). Dashboard shows 2 Active Initiatives, 72 Points in Flight.

mocked_apis.note: NO MOCKED APIs - All APIs use real backend

landing_page.description: Landing page loads with JarlPM branding, hero section, Sign in/Get Started buttons

login_flow.description: Login with test@jarlpm.com / Test123! redirects to /dashboard

logout_flow.description: User menu dropdown shows Log out option, clicking redirects to landing page

signup_page.description: Signup form loads with Full Name, Email, Password, Confirm Password fields and validation

vite_host_fix_verification.issue: Vite was blocking host aipm-platform-1.preview.emergentagent.com causing net::ERR_CONNECTION_REFUSED
vite_host_fix_verification.fix: Changed vite.config.js allowedHosts from explicit array to wildcard ['.preview.emergentagent.com']
vite_host_fix_verification.status: VERIFIED WORKING - Frontend loads correctly at preview URL
